item.title: Uno Platform Studio & 6.0 - Demos, Faceoff & Giveaways!
item.description:
Make sure to tune in tomorrow, May 15th at 11 AM Eastern, as the Uno team showcases Uno Platform Studio and Uno Platform 6.0.
We'll be diving deep with tons of demos, and a fun productivity faceoff between two of our devs.
We'll be looking at:
The key features in 6.0 that represent the culmination of a 7-year journey and what's next
How Uno Platform Studio is set to redefine productivity for .NET developers.
Real-time coding ‚Äì no pre-recorded stuff or smoke and mirrors here!
Plus, we're giving away some cool prizes during the event, so make sure to tune in live and participate!
üéôÔ∏è New to streaming or looking to level up? Check out StreamYard and get $10 discount! üòç https://streamyard.com/pal/d/5664920719982592

item.title: Writing that changed how I think about PL
item.description: Every so often I come across a paper, blog post, or (occasionally) video that completely changes how I think about a topic in programming languages and compilers. For some of these posts, I can‚Äôt even remember how I thought about the idea before reading it‚Äîit was that impactful.

item.title: Visual Studio 2022 + Copilot Agent Mode + Model Context Protocol (MCP) Servers Are Here!
item.description:
The biggest release of Visual Studio just dropped with GitHub Copilot agent mode, MCP Server support, and so much more! How do you get agent mode enabled and what all can it do? Also, what the heck is an MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server, why do you care, how does it help you, how does it help software development, and how do you get it setup in Visual Studio with GitHub Copilot. Let's do it!
Links: Get Visual Studio: http://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads Launch Blog: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/agent-mode-has-arrived-in-preview-for-visual-studio/ Agent Mode Docs: https://learn.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/copilot-agent-mode MCP Docs: https://learn.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/mcp-servers Get GitHub Copilot: http://aka.ms/copilot-free Model Context Protocol: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol MCP Servers: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers MCP C# SDK: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/csharp-sdk Monkey MCP Server: https://github.com/jamesmontemagno/MonkeyMCP
Chapters: 00:00 - Intro 00:40 - Setting up & using agent mode in Visual Studio 06:25 - What are MCP servers? 08:30 - Setting up & using MCP servers in Visual Studio 13:40 - Wrap-up
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCENTmbKaTphpWV2R2evVz2A/join

item.title: Career Switcher Uses THIS TRICK on their Developer Resume!
item.description:

item.title: Disabling Indices in a -bacpac file (Sql Server)
item.description: We store most of our application's data in an SQL server database. Sometimes, we need to transfer the data locally to debug defects related to production data.
